trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Tustin
There were no other sightings in Tustin on or around September 6th 2013
Summary: Very bright burning orb moving toward us then stopped and parked in place
divs: sighting detailssitting in front of house w\ 2 others at approx. 8:15 pm. saw bright red\orange light moving quickly from the s\w toward the north then stopping in a parked position less than 1\4 mile away. object remained for approx 2 min. then appeared to ascend and then dull out (slowly dissipate) this is the 2nd one i have seen w\in the last 3 months in the same direction around same time of day. we recorded it on an i phone for 1:58 min's
